attributes.action: I.D.Cards or forms of identification for ex members of military stating they are  veterns
attributes.additional_details: i would like to see an id card much like the armed forces id card which states all of your details like the military id  card did but mentions that you are retired .,as i and many ex military feel that for places of interest that current military personnel get in to free of charge the veterns dont and this unfair as we have all served our country.
